desc: What's New specialising in the sale of Gifts, Novelties and Licensed Merchandise, inclusive of AFL Products, Holden and Ford to name a few. Visit our stores at Hobart and Northgate for the perfect gift or view our range online!

layout.text:
The specialty gift store with a diverse range of unique gift to delight everyone!
Find the gift for every person and every occasion, in Northgate Shopping Centre and online!
